scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && parcel build --no-source-maps --no-content-hash application/index.html  && cp application/manifest.webapp dist && mkdir dist/assets && cp -r application/assets/icons dist/assets/ && cp application/assets/css/marker-icon.png application/&& cp application/assets/css/images/marker-icon-2x.png application/ &&  mkdir -p dist/assets/js/ &&cp -r application/assets/css docs/assets/ && cp application/assets/js/kaiads.v5.min.js dist/assets/js/
scripts.web: rm -rf docs/* && parcel build --dist-dir docs --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-content-hash application/index.html && cp application/manifest.webapp docs && cp application/manifest.webmanifest docs && mkdir -p docs/assets && cp -r application/assets/icons docs/assets/ && cp -r application/assets/css docs/assets/ &&  cp application/assets/css/images/marker-icon-2x.png application/ && mkdir -p docs/assets/js/ && cp application/assets/js/kaiads.v5.min.js docs/assets/js/ &&cp application/assets/css/marker-icon.png docs/ &&  cp -r application/assets/fonts docs/assets/&& ./generate_file_list.sh
